transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan hello
Executive: Madam main Sandeep baat kar raha tha awaz aa rahi hai madam aapko
Customer: Hello sorry
Executive: Haan madam main Sandeep baat kar raha tha India Mart se Nilesh sir honge waha
Customer: Actually wo abhi nahi hai available
Executive: Achcha achcha nahi actually wo na wo complaint kuch raise kiye the India Mart pe ki unko business wagera nahi ja raha hai matlab aur south se jyada ja raha hai to unse discussion hua tha but ha bas uske baad ek video meeting pe maine kaha tha kyuki jo cheeze hai na wo video meeting pe hi main action wagera karane the kyuki wo kuch unka preferred location ho rakha tha wo hatwani thi mujhe but uske baad se wo fir call pe kahin aur busy ho gaye to aap bhi madam dekhte hai na ise
Customer: Main dekhti hu par jyada to daddy dekhte hai to wo uthne ke baad main aapko call kar sakti hu a little busy right now and
Executive: Achcha achcha sir so rahe hai kya abhi
Customer: Haan haan to fir time lagega
Executive: Kitna der mein kar lo aap ye batao
Customer: Ek ghanta to lagega dopahar ki time hai wo phone off karke sote hai
Executive: 4 baje wo free rahenge 4 4:30 kitna baje kar exact bata do aap
Customer: 4:30 kar do call
Executive: 4:30 theek hai madam ok ha ok fine thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Preferred location needs to be removed.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to call back at 4:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 4:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, preferred location, follow up
